about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack for Submerged : Hidden Depths, composed by BAFTA-award-winner Jeff van Dyck.
The game was developed by Uppercut Games.
It features a live string quartet recorded at the Brighton Concert Hall in Adelaide, South Australia.

Music Composer & Producer
Jeff van Dyck

Music Transcription & Preparation
Christopher Larkin
Nathan Cummins

Recording Venue
Brighton Concert Hall
Adelaide, South Australia

Engineer
Christopher Larkin

1st Violin
Belinda Gehlert

2nd Violin
Lachlan Bramble
Emma Perkins

Viola
Linda Garrett

Cello
Gemma Philips
Tom Marlin

Vocals
Angela van Dyck
Ella van Dyck

House Technician
John Schroeder

Mastered by Matthew Gray at Matthew Gray Mastering

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1500 MB available space
